text:
Hey <!everyone>!!

It's the last few days of our Prospela programme :scream::scream:! 

We'll be formally closing your mentee channels at 11:59pm on Sunday so it's perhaps worth starting to think about setting a few medium-term goals for your mentees for after the programme and rounding off your conversations.

>*A good end is as important as a good beginning for an E-Mentoring relationship!* It's a good idea to reflect on what you've both learned, what you enjoyed / what surprised you and - of course - wish each other all the best for the future!

_Note: We'll be keeping open the "hello-mentors" channel beyond Sunday_

Hey <!everyone>!!

It's the last few days of our Prospela programme :scream::scream:! 

We'll be formally closing your mentee channels at *11:59pm on Sunday* so it's perhaps worth starting to think about rounding off your conversations ... perhaps help your mentees set a few medium-term goals for after the programme ends.

>*A good end is as important as a good beginning for an E-Mentoring relationship!* It's a good idea to reflect on what you've both learned, what you enjoyed / what surprised you and - of course - wish each other all the best for the future!


_Note: We'll be keeping open the "hello-mentors" channel beyond Sunday_

Hey <!everyone>!!

It's the last few days of our Prospela programme :scream::scream:! 

We'll be formally closing your mentee channels on *Sunday at 11:59pm* so it's perhaps worth starting to think about rounding off your conversations and reflecting on the last 2 months!

>*A good end is as important as a good beginning for an E-Mentoring relationship!* It's a good idea to reflect on what you've both learned, what you enjoyed / what surprised you, set a few medium-term goals for Mentees post-programme, and - of course - wish each other all the best for the future!

_Note: We'll be keeping open the "hello-mentors" channel beyond Sunday_
